back_flavor: Chiaki Asami lived with his parents in an unstable country on the brink of rebellion. Just a child, he was forced to watch as the ensuing chaos stole his family from him. Forming a small group with refugees including Akira Hojo, he attempted flee the country. Only the two of them had survived by the time they reached the new world of Arkham. Chiaki was disgusted by the state of society when he saw the broken city. He vowed to take the political reins of Arkham and steer it towards a brighter future. Criminals, the corrupt, and even the abyss itself be damned.

back_flavor: Jack always had a knack for getting people what they needed, and for a low enough price to raise eyebrows. As he moved from job to job, he found that he could help people who were in too deep, but only if he was willing to take on the burden himself. His debt grew with each person he saved, and so did the shadiness of his activities. Eventually, he found the police knocking on his door, so he fled into the depths of Arkham. These days, Jack can be found in dark alleys, making deals that the police could hardly imagine, to pay off his most recent debt.

[eldersign] effect: +1, if you succeed; draw a card and you may move a card in your hand up to 3 positions to the left or right.

back_flavor: Akira Hojo lived with his father who worked as a doctor in a dangerously unstable country. When the chaos erupted, it took everything from him. He gathered together other suffering children to survive. With Chiaki Asami and few others, he fled the country. Only he and Chiaki managed to survive the journey. When he reached the safety of Arkham, he was met with by a dark, warped city. He decided he would reform the criminal underbelly of Arkham. He vowed to turn these gangsters into a force that could protect Arkham from the anything, be it man or monster.

name: Akira Hojo

[eldersign] effect: +1. If the resolution of this test defeats an enemy; gain 2 resources.

back_flavor: The people around Alma always met gruesome fates. As an orphan, whenever she got close to others, they would suffer. As she grew older, she realized that she was the source of their misfortune, and their deaths. Distraught, she wandered into the depths of Arkham, and there she found them. People who didn't care that she was a cursed existence, because they were already doomed. She stood up for these hapless souls. Wouldn't let anyone look down on them. Her compassion earns their loyalty, for as long as they last.

back_flavor: During every age, terrors would try to invade the world. While most of humanity remained unaware, William was there, holding the final line between the world and the forces outside its understanding. From place to place, age to age, whenever the tides of madness began, he was there, waiting. Sometimes, he wonders if he holds back the chaos, or if his birth marks the start of the apocalypse.
